api/Global.html.title: Namespace | Portal2D
api/Global.html.keywords: Namespace Classes BossFightTrigger BoxTrigger Simple helper class that forwards OnTriggerEnter/Leave events Cake Class representing cake easter egg CameraFollow Class responsible for camera following the player CloneAnimSync Class responsible for synchronizing the animation of the source object to the destination object CommonFunctions Class containing common functions Dispenser Class responsible for dispensing cubes DoorIn Class responsible for the behaviour of the door which player enters through DoorOut Class responsible for the behaviour of the door leading out of the level Enemy Class representing an enemy - turret. It handles updating its sprites based on its state (alive/dead), tracks the player to kill, and allows the user to eliminate it from the scene. ExcursionFunnel Class responsible for the behavior of excursion funnels GladosBehaviour Component responsible for the behaviour of the Glados boss. Lasers Laser class - controls laser behaviour MirrorCube Class representing a mirror cube that can interact with lasers and angle them accordingly PanelManager Class managing UI panels PickableObject Class responsible for behaviour of pickable objects. It implements the IPortalEventsListener interface. PlayerAim Class responsible for the behaviour of the player's aim PlayerHurt Class to controll the appearance and behavior of the player while hurt PlayerMovement Class responsible for managing player movement PortalAdapter Class for all objects that can interact with portals PortalBehaviour Class responsible for managing basic portal behaviour PortalButton Class responsible for the behaviour of portal buttons PortalCloneController Helper class for managing position and rotation of cloned object PortalContinuedPathGenerator Class responsible for generating the path which can be continued by the portal PortalLaser Class to controll the lasers emitted by the portals PortalLogic Component responsible for the logic of the portal. PortalManager Class that manages portals and their spawning. PortalSceneManager PortalSpriteController Class responsible for portal sprite animation ProgressBar Projectile Class representing a projectile Receiver Class to control the laser receiver. Structs CloneAnimPair Helper struct for connecting the source and clone of the animation Interfaces IPortalEventsListener Interface for objects which can interact with portals Enums Projectile.eProjectileType Projectile types
